metrics_explained.time_to_50pct: Months until normalized volume drops to 50% (0.5)
metrics_explained.erosion_first_6m: Average erosion rate in first 6 months (1 - mean_vol_norm)
metrics_explained.final_equilibrium: Mean normalized volume in months 18-23 (final stable level)

interpretation.bucket_1_pattern: Fast erosion: quick time to 50%, high early erosion, low final equilibrium
interpretation.bucket_2_pattern: Slower erosion: longer time to 50% (or never), lower early erosion, higher final equilibrium
interpretation.key_difference: Bucket 1 brands lose volume much faster and stabilize at lower levels
